meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kathy Fuller Gerry Daley Glenn Kane Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1076.

td.p: Kathy Fuller, a graduate student from Baltimore, Maryland
Gerry Daley, a manufactor's represenative originally from Waterbury, Connecticut
Glenn Kane, an emergency physician from Venice, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $23,699)

tr.td: CURRENT EVENTS
ZOOLOGY
A.K.A.
ADS & COMMERCIALS
VOCABULARY
RECORDERS
